biography.title: My Journey
biography.content:
I'm a Frontend Developer specialized in React, TypeScript, and the modern JavaScript ecosystem. I'm passionate about building web applications that combine performance, accessibility, and excellent user experience.

My unique profile combines 5+ years in frontend development with 14 years of enterprise experience in critical systems (Amadeus GDS). This combination allows me to understand both technical requirements and business needs, creating solutions that deliver real value.
